Underworld 2

Underworld 2 Underworld is our parallel, particle-in-cell, finite element geodynamics code. The code base has been around for 10 or so years now and has been largely debugged and is known to work well on hundreds to thousands of processors. We have engineered some pretty robust solver methods and lots of flexibilit...

Viscoelasticity in Underworld

Viscoelasticity has been a hidden feature of Underworld for some time now, initially in the experimental branch (alpha testing) and more recently, in the mainstream version.
